? Opened shader file: shaders/vertex.glsl
----- Shader Code Start -----
#version 330 core

layout(location = 0) in vec3 aPos;
layout(location = 1) in vec3 aNormal;

uniform mat4 model;
uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 projection;
uniform int shadingMode;

out vec3 FragPos;
out vec3 Normal;
out vec3 GouraudLight;
out vec2 UV;

struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

void main()
{
    vec4 worldPos = model * vec4(aPos, 1.0);
    FragPos = worldPos.xyz;
    Normal = mat3(transpose(inverse(model))) * aNormal;
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5; // Fake UVs if not using real ones

    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(-FragPos);
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            GouraudLight += diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }

    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/fragment.glsl
----- Shader Code Start -----
﻿#version 330 core

out vec4 FragColor;

in vec3 FragPos;
in vec3 Normal;
in vec3 GouraudLight;
in vec2 UV;

uniform sampler2D cowTexture;
uniform bool useTexture;
uniform int shadingMode;

uniform vec3 objectColor = vec3(1.0); // fallback if no texture

struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

void main()
{
    vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
    vec3 viewDir = normalize(-FragPos);
    vec3 lightResult = vec3(0.0);

    if (shadingMode == 0) {
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, lightDir), 0.0);
            lightResult += diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        lightResult = GouraudLight;
    }
    else {
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            lightResult += diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }

    vec3 baseColor = useTexture ? texture(cowTexture, UV).rgb : objectColor;
    FragColor = vec4(baseColor * lightResult, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

----- Shader Code Start -----
﻿#version 330 core

out vec4 FragColor;

in vec3 FragPos;
in vec3 Normal;
in vec3 GouraudLight;
in vec2 UV;

uniform sampler2D cowTexture;
uniform bool useTexture;
uniform int shadingMode;

uniform vec3 objectColor = vec3(1.0); // fallback if no texture

struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

void main()
{
    vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
    vec3 viewDir = normalize(-FragPos);
    vec3 lightResult = vec3(0.0);

    if (shadingMode == 0) {
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, lightDir), 0.0);
            lightResult += diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        lightResult = GouraudLight;
    }
    else {
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            lightResult += diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }

    vec3 baseColor = useTexture ? texture(cowTexture, UV).rgb : objectColor;
    FragColor = vec4(baseColor * lightResult, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/vertex.glsl
----- Shader Code Start -----
#version 330 core

layout(location = 0) in vec3 aPos;
layout(location = 1) in vec3 aNormal;

uniform mat4 model;
uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 projection;
uniform int shadingMode;

out vec3 FragPos;
out vec3 Normal;
out vec3 GouraudLight;
out vec2 UV;

struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

void main()
{
    vec4 worldPos = model * vec4(aPos, 1.0);
    FragPos = worldPos.xyz;
    Normal = mat3(transpose(inverse(model))) * aNormal;
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5; // Fake UVs if not using real ones

    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(-FragPos);
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            GouraudLight += diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }

    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/grid.vert
----- Shader Code Start -----
#version 330 core

layout(location = 0) in vec2 aPos;

out vec2 vUV;

void main()
{
    vUV = aPos * 0.5 + 0.5; // Convert from [-1,1] to [0,1]
    gl_Position = vec4(aPos, 0.0, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/grid.frag
----- Shader Code Start -----
#version 330 core

in vec2 vUV;
out vec4 FragColor;

uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 projection;
uniform vec3 cameraPos;

// Control grid look
const float gridSize = 1.0;
const float lineWidth = 0.02;
const vec3 gridColor = vec3(0.5);
const vec3 axisColor = vec3(1.0, 0.0, 0.0); // Red X and Blue Z later

void main()
{
    // Raycast into world from UV
    vec2 screenUV = vUV * 2.0 - 1.0;
    vec4 clip = vec4(screenUV, -1.0, 1.0);
    vec4 eye = inverse(projection) * clip;
    eye = vec4(eye.xy, -1.0, 0.0);
    vec3 rayDir = normalize((inverse(view) * eye).xyz);

    // Find intersection with y=0 plane (ZX plane)
    float t = -cameraPos.y / rayDir.y;
    vec3 pos = cameraPos + t * rayDir;

    // Draw grid lines by checking how close to nearest integer
    float xLine = abs(fract(pos.x / gridSize) - 0.5);
    float zLine = abs(fract(pos.z / gridSize) - 0.5);
    float line = min(xLine, zLine);

    float intensity = smoothstep(lineWidth, 0.0, line);
    vec3 finalColor = mix(vec3(0.0), gridColor, intensity);

    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

layout(location = 1) in vec3 aNormal;

uniform mat4 model;
uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 projection;
uniform int shadingMode;

out vec3 FragPos;
out vec3 Normal;
out vec3 GouraudLight;
out vec2 UV;

struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

void main()
{
    vec4 worldPos = model * vec4(aPos, 1.0);
    FragPos = worldPos.xyz;
    Normal = mat3(transpose(inverse(model))) * aNormal;
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5; // Fake UVs if not using real ones

    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(-FragPos);
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            GouraudLight += diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }

    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/standard.frag
----- Shader Code Start -----
﻿#version 330 core

out vec4 FragColor;

in vec3 FragPos;
in vec3 Normal;
in vec3 GouraudLight;
in vec2 UV;

uniform sampler2D cowTexture;
uniform bool useTexture;
uniform int shadingMode;

uniform vec3 objectColor = vec3(1.0); // fallback if no texture

struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

void main()
{
    vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
    vec3 viewDir = normalize(-FragPos);
    vec3 lightResult = vec3(0.0);

    if (shadingMode == 0) {
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, lightDir), 0.0);
            lightResult += diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        lightResult = GouraudLight;
    }
    else {
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            lightResult += diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }

    vec3 baseColor = useTexture ? texture(cowTexture, UV).rgb : objectColor;
    FragColor = vec4(baseColor * lightResult, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

    FragPos = worldPos.xyz;
    Normal = mat3(transpose(inverse(model))) * aNormal;
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5; // Fake UVs if not using real ones

    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(-FragPos);
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            GouraudLight += diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }

    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

? Opened shader file: shaders/standard.vert
----- Shader Code Start -----
// standard.vert
#version 330 core
layout(location = 0) in vec3 aPos;
layout(location = 1) in vec3 aNormal;
layout(location = 2) in vec2 aTexCoord;

out vec3 vNormal;     // For Phong shading, pass to frag
out vec3 vWorldPos;   // For lighting
out vec2 vTexCoord;   // For texturing
out vec3 vColorGouraud; // If we do Gouraud, store the final color here

uniform mat4 model;
uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 projection;

// We also need some lighting uniforms well do in frag for Phong
uniform int shadingMode;
uniform vec4 globalAmbient;
uniform int numLights;
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};
uniform Light lights[10]; // or however many

// For material
uniform vec3 materialSpecular; 
uniform float materialShininess;

void main()
{
    // position in world space
    vec4 worldPos4 = model * vec4(aPos, 1.0);
    vWorldPos      = worldPos4.xyz;

    // normal in world space
    mat3 normalMatrix = mat3(transpose(inverse(model)));
    vNormal = normalize(normalMatrix * aNormal);

    vTexCoord = aTexCoord;

    // If Gouraud shading, do lighting here in vertex shader
    if (shadingMode == 1) // 1 = Gouraud
    {
        // simple Blinn-Phong or Phong-like lighting at the vertex
        vec3 normal = normalize(vNormal);
        
        // NOTE: you need camera position for specular; pass as uniform or define a uniform 
        vec3 cameraPos = vec3(0,0,10); // or set via uniform
        vec3 viewDir   = normalize(cameraPos - vWorldPos);

        // Start with global ambient
        vec3 color = globalAmbient.rgb;

        for (int i=0; i<numLights; i++)
        {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - vWorldPos);
            float diff    = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);

            // Half-vector for Blinn-Phong
            vec3 halfDir  = normalize(lightDir + viewDir);
            float spec    = 0.0;
            if (diff > 0.0) {
                spec = pow(max(dot(normal, halfDir), 0.0), materialShininess);
            }
            // combine
            vec3 lightColor = lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
            color += lightColor * diff;            // diffuse
            color += lightColor * spec * materialSpecular; // specular
        }
        vColorGouraud = color;
    }

    // transform final position
    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos4;
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/standard.frag
----- Shader Code Start -----
﻿// standard.frag
#version 330 core
in vec3 vNormal;
in vec3 vWorldPos;
in vec2 vTexCoord;
in vec3 vColorGouraud;  // used if shadingMode=1

out vec4 FragColor;

uniform int shadingMode;  // 0=Flat, 1=Gouraud, 2=Phong
uniform sampler2D cowTexture;
uniform bool useTexture;

uniform vec4 globalAmbient;

uniform int numLights;
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};
uniform Light lights[10];

// Material
uniform vec3 materialSpecular;
uniform float materialShininess;

// For camera
uniform vec3 cameraPos;

void main()
{
    // If Gouraud, just output the color computed in the vertex shader:
    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec4 gouraudColor = vec4(vColorGouraud, 1.0);
        if(useTexture) {
            gouraudColor *= texture(cowTexture, vTexCoord);
        }
        FragColor = gouraudColor;
        return;
    }
    
    // For Flat or Phong shading, do the lighting here in the fragment shader.
    // "Flat" means each fragment uses the same normal per face. 
    // In modern OpenGL, to do *true* flat shading, enable "flat" interpolation:
    //   in flat vec3 vNormal; 
    // Or we can just do normal interpolation but effectively still do a single color if desired.

    // For demonstration, let's do real "Phong" if shadingMode=2, 
    // or approximate a "Flat" approach if shadingMode=0. 

    // For a quick "flat" shading hack: re-normalize the interpolated normal 
    // but do not re-normalize each pixel's normal differently. Or use a geometry shader to pass face normal. 
    // We'll do an approximate method:

    vec3 normal = normalize(vNormal);
    if(shadingMode == 0) {
       // "flat" approach: just do a normal re-normalize, ignoring smooth interpolation
       // real approach would need 'flat' interpolation qualifier or geometry shader
    }

    // now do a standard Phong reflection:
    vec3 viewDir = normalize(cameraPos - vWorldPos);
    vec3 lighting = globalAmbient.rgb;

    for (int i=0; i<numLights; i++) {
        vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - vWorldPos);
        float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
        
        // spec
        vec3 halfDir = normalize(lightDir + viewDir);
        float spec = 0.0;
        if(diff > 0.0) {
            spec = pow(max(dot(normal, halfDir), 0.0), materialShininess);
        }
        vec3 lightColor = lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        lighting += lightColor * diff;                     // diffuse
        lighting += lightColor * spec * materialSpecular;  // spec
    }

    vec4 finalColor = vec4(lighting, 1.0);

    if (useTexture) {
        finalColor *= texture(cowTexture, vTexCoord);
    }
    FragColor = finalColor;
}

----- Shader Code End -----

#version 330 core

layout(location = 0) in vec3 aPos;
layout(location = 1) in vec3 aNormal;

uniform mat4 model;
uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 projection;
uniform int shadingMode;

out vec3 FragPos;
out vec3 Normal;
out vec3 GouraudLight;
out vec2 UV;

struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

void main()
{
    vec4 worldPos = model * vec4(aPos, 1.0);
    FragPos = worldPos.xyz;
    Normal = mat3(transpose(inverse(model))) * aNormal;
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5; // Fake UVs if not using real ones

    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(-FragPos);
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            GouraudLight += diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }

    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/standard.frag
----- Shader Code Start -----
﻿#version 330 core

out vec4 FragColor;

in vec3 FragPos;
in vec3 Normal;
in vec3 GouraudLight;
in vec2 UV;

uniform sampler2D cowTexture;
uniform bool useTexture;
uniform int shadingMode;

uniform vec3 objectColor = vec3(1.0); // fallback if no texture

struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

void main()
{
    vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
    vec3 viewDir = normalize(-FragPos);
    vec3 lightResult = vec3(0.0);

    if (shadingMode == 0) {
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, lightDir), 0.0);
            lightResult += diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        lightResult = GouraudLight;
    }
    else {
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            lightResult += diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }

    vec3 baseColor = useTexture ? texture(cowTexture, UV).rgb : objectColor;
    FragColor = vec4(baseColor * lightResult, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/standard.frag
----- Shader Code Start -----
﻿#version 330 core

out vec4 FragColor;

in vec3 FragPos;
in vec3 Normal;
in vec3 GouraudLight;
in vec2 UV;

// Texturing & shading mode controls
uniform sampler2D cowTexture;
uniform bool useTexture;
uniform int shadingMode;
uniform vec3 objectColor; // fallback if no texture

// NEW: Global ambient light
uniform vec4 globalAmbient; 

// Light struct
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity; // If intensity=0, treat as 'disabled'.
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

void main()
{
    // Base color from texture or solid color
    vec3 baseColor = useTexture ? texture(cowTexture, UV).rgb : objectColor;

    // Start with ambient term
    vec3 totalLight = globalAmbient.rgb; // ignoring globalAmbient.a here, typically it’s not used for shading

    // Normalized normal & view direction (if needed)
    vec3 N = normalize(Normal);

    // Decide on lighting based on shading mode
    if (shadingMode == 0) {
        // ---- FLAT (face) Shading ----
        // Recompute a face normal using derivatives of FragPos
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));

        vec3 flatLighting = vec3(0.0);
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, lightDir), 0.0);
            flatLighting += diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
        totalLight += flatLighting;
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        // ---- GOURAUD Shading ----
        // GouraudLight was computed in the vertex shader (diffuse, etc.).
        // Just add it to global ambient here
        totalLight += GouraudLight; 
    }
    else {
        // ---- PHONG Shading ----
        // Per-pixel normal-based lighting:
        vec3 phongLighting = vec3(0.0);
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(N, lightDir), 0.0);
            phongLighting += diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
        totalLight += phongLighting;
    }

    // Final color
    vec3 finalColor = baseColor * totalLight;
    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

        vec3 phongLighting = vec3(0.0);
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(N, lightDir), 0.0);
            phongLighting += diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
        totalLight += phongLighting;
    }

    // Final color
    vec3 finalColor = baseColor * totalLight;
    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

#version 330 core

layout(location = 0) in vec3 aPos;
layout(location = 1) in vec3 aNormal;

// Matrices
uniform mat4 model;
uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 projection;

// Shading mode: 0=Flat, 1=Gouraud, 2=Phong (example)
uniform int shadingMode;

// To store in the fragment
out vec3 FragPos;
out vec3 Normal;
out vec3 GouraudLight;
out vec2 UV;

// Lights
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// For specular
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    float shininess; // e.g. 32.0 or 128.0 for sharper highlight
};

uniform Material material;
uniform vec3 viewPos; // Camera position in world space

void main()
{
    vec4 worldPos = model * vec4(aPos, 1.0);
    FragPos = worldPos.xyz;
    
    // Transform normal by normal matrix
    Normal = mat3(transpose(inverse(model))) * aNormal;
    
    // Simple UV generation
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5; // if you need a placeholder

    // Default to black if not in Gouraud mode
    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        // Gouraud shading: compute lighting at vertex
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(viewPos - FragPos);

        // Start with zero or ambient
        // For true Gouraud with ambient, you can do:
        // GouraudLight = material.ambient; 
        // but we often handle ambient separately

        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            // Direction from vertex to light
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);

            // Diffuse
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            vec3 diffuse = material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            // Specular (classic Phong reflection model)
            vec3 reflectDir = reflect(-lightDir, normal);
            float spec = pow(max(dot(viewDir, reflectDir), 0.0), material.shininess);
            vec3 specular = material.specular * spec * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            // Add them
            GouraudLight += diffuse + specular;
        }
    }

    // Final position
    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/standard.frag
----- Shader Code Start -----
﻿#version 330 core

out vec4 FragColor;

in vec3 FragPos;
in vec3 Normal;
in vec3 GouraudLight;
in vec2 UV;

// Texturing & shading mode controls
uniform sampler2D cowTexture;
uniform bool useTexture;
uniform int shadingMode;
uniform vec3 objectColor; // fallback if no texture

// NEW: Global ambient light
uniform vec4 globalAmbient; 

// Light struct
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity; // If intensity=0, treat as 'disabled'.
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

void main()
{
    // Base color from texture or solid color
    vec3 baseColor = useTexture ? texture(cowTexture, UV).rgb : objectColor;

    // Start with ambient term
    vec3 totalLight = globalAmbient.rgb; // ignoring globalAmbient.a here, typically it’s not used for shading

    // Normalized normal & view direction (if needed)
    vec3 N = normalize(Normal);

    // Decide on lighting based on shading mode
    if (shadingMode == 0) {
        // ---- FLAT (face) Shading ----
        // Recompute a face normal using derivatives of FragPos
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));

        vec3 flatLighting = vec3(0.0);
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, lightDir), 0.0);
            flatLighting += diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
        totalLight += flatLighting;
    }
else if (shadingMode == 1) {
    // Gouraud shading - use the color passed from the vertex shader
    finalColor = baseColor * GouraudLight;
}
    else {
        // ---- PHONG Shading ----
        // Per-pixel normal-based lighting:
        vec3 phongLighting = vec3(0.0);
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(N, lightDir), 0.0);
            phongLighting += diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
        totalLight += phongLighting;
    }

    // Final color
    vec3 finalColor = baseColor * totalLight;
    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/standard.frag
----- Shader Code Start -----
﻿#version 330 core

out vec4 FragColor;

in vec3 FragPos;
in vec3 Normal;
in vec3 GouraudLight;  // We only use this if shadingMode == 1
in vec2 UV;

// For texturing & shading controls
uniform sampler2D cowTexture;
uniform bool useTexture;
uniform int shadingMode;
uniform vec3 objectColor; // Used if no texture

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Global ambient
uniform vec4 globalAmbient; // .a often unused, so we take .rgb

// Light struct
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity; // If 0, treat as disabled
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Material struct
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess; // e.g., 32 for moderate highlight
    float roughness; // optional
    float metallic;  // optional
};
uniform Material material;

// Camera position (for specular reflection)
uniform vec3 viewPos;

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Main
void main()
{
    // Base color from either texture or a fallback color
    vec3 baseColor = useTexture ? texture(cowTexture, UV).rgb : objectColor;

    // Start with an ambient term combining globalAmbient and the material's own ambient color
    vec3 totalLight = globalAmbient.rgb * material.ambient;

    // Decide on shading mode
    if (shadingMode == 0) {
        // ----- FLAT Shading -----
        // Recompute a face normal using derivatives
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));

        // Simple diffuse (no specular) for each light
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 L = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, L), 0.0);
            totalLight += material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        // ----- GOURAUD Shading -----
        // The vertex shader already computed the sum of (diffuse + specular).
        // Just add that to our current totalLight:
        totalLight += GouraudLight;
    }
    else {
        // ----- PHONG Shading -----
        // Per-pixel normal-based lighting
        vec3 N = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 V = normalize(viewPos - FragPos);  // camera direction

        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 L = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);

            // Diffuse
            float diff = max(dot(N, L), 0.0);
            vec3 diffuse = material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            // Specular
            vec3 R = reflect(-L, N);
            float specFactor = pow(max(dot(V, R), 0.0), material.shininess);
            vec3 specular = material.specular * specFactor * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            // Accumulate
            totalLight += diffuse + specular;
        }
    }

    // Combine lighting with the baseColor (texture or objectColor)
    vec3 finalColor = baseColor * totalLight;

    // Output the fragment color
    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

uniform int shadingMode;
uniform vec3 objectColor; // fallback if no texture

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Global ambient
uniform vec4 globalAmbient; // .a is often unused, so we just use .rgb

// Light struct
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity; // If 0, treat as disabled
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Material struct
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess; // e.g., 32 for moderate highlight
    float roughness; // optional, not used here
    float metallic;  // optional, not used here
};
uniform Material material;

// Camera position (for specular reflection in Gouraud)
uniform vec3 viewPos;

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Main
void main()
{
    // Base color from either texture or fallback color
    vec3 baseColor = useTexture ? texture(cowTexture, UV).rgb : objectColor;

    // Start with an ambient term (global + material's own ambient color)
    vec3 totalLight = globalAmbient.rgb * material.ambient;

    if (shadingMode == 0) {
        // ----- FLAT Shading -----
        // Recompute a face normal using derivatives
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));

        // Simple diffuse for each light
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 L = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, L), 0.0);
            totalLight += material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        // ----- GOURAUD Shading -----
        // The vertex shader already computed diffuse + specular
        totalLight += GouraudLight;
    }

    // Multiply lighting by base color (texture or objectColor)
    vec3 finalColor = baseColor * totalLight;
    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

#version 330 core

layout(location = 0) in vec3 aPos;
layout(location = 1) in vec3 aNormal;

// Matrices
uniform mat4 model;
uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 projection;

// Shading mode: 0=Flat, 1=Gouraud
uniform int shadingMode;

// Outputs to the fragment shader
out vec3 FragPos;
out vec3 Normal;
out vec3 GouraudLight;
out vec2 UV;

// Lights
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// Material for Gouraud specular
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    float shininess;  // e.g. 32.0
    // (ambient, roughness, metallic not strictly needed in vertex)
};

uniform Material material;
uniform vec3 viewPos; // Camera position in world space

void main()
{
    // Compute position in world space
    vec4 worldPos = model * vec4(aPos, 1.0);
    FragPos = worldPos.xyz;

    // Normal transformation via normal matrix
    Normal = mat3(transpose(inverse(model))) * aNormal;

    // Simple placeholder UV mapping
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5;

    // Default to black unless we're in Gouraud shading mode
    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    // Only compute Gouraud if shadingMode == 1
    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(viewPos - FragPos);

        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);

            // Diffuse
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            vec3 diffuse = material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            // Specular (Phong reflection model but computed at vertex)
            vec3 reflectDir = reflect(-lightDir, normal);
            float spec = pow(max(dot(viewDir, reflectDir), 0.0), material.shininess);
            vec3 specular = material.specular * spec * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            GouraudLight += diffuse + specular;
        }
    }

    // Final position for rasterization
    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 L = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, L), 0.0);
            totalLight += material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        // ----- GOURAUD Shading -----
        // The vertex shader already computed diffuse + specular
        totalLight += GouraudLight;
    }

    // Multiply lighting by base color (texture or objectColor)
    vec3 finalColor = baseColor * totalLight;
    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;

        // ----- FLAT Shading -----
        // Recompute a face normal using derivatives
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));

        // Simple diffuse for each light
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 L = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, L), 0.0);
            totalLight += material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        // ----- GOURAUD Shading -----
        // The vertex shader already computed diffuse + specular
        totalLight += GouraudLight;
    }

    // Multiply lighting by base color (texture or objectColor)
    vec3 finalColor = baseColor * totalLight;
    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

#version 330 core

layout(location = 0) in vec3 aPos;
layout(location = 1) in vec3 aNormal;

// Matrices
uniform mat4 model;
uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 projection;

// Shading mode: 0=Flat, 1=Gouraud
uniform int shadingMode;

// Outputs to the fragment shader
out vec3 FragPos;
out vec3 Normal;
out vec3 GouraudLight;
out vec2 UV;

// Lights
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// Material for Gouraud specular
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};

uniform Material material;
uniform vec3 viewPos; // Camera position in world space

void main()
{
    // Compute position in world space
    vec4 worldPos = model * vec4(aPos, 1.0);
    FragPos = worldPos.xyz;

    // Normal transformation via normal matrix
    Normal = mat3(transpose(inverse(model))) * aNormal;

    // Simple placeholder UV mapping
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5;

    // Default to black unless we're in Gouraud shading mode
    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    // Only compute Gouraud if shadingMode == 1
    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(viewPos - FragPos);

        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);

            // Diffuse
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            vec3 diffuse = material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            // Specular (Phong reflection model but computed at vertex)
            vec3 reflectDir = reflect(-lightDir, normal);
            float spec = pow(max(dot(viewDir, reflectDir), 0.0), material.shininess);
            vec3 specular = material.specular * spec * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            GouraudLight += diffuse + specular;
        }
    }

    // Final position for rasterization
    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

    // Simple placeholder UV mapping
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5;

    // Default to black unless we're in Gouraud shading mode
    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    // Only compute Gouraud if shadingMode == 1
    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(viewPos - FragPos);

        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);

            // Diffuse
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            vec3 diffuse = material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            // Specular (Phong reflection model but computed at vertex)
            vec3 reflectDir = reflect(-lightDir, normal);
            float spec = pow(max(dot(viewDir, reflectDir), 0.0), material.shininess);
            vec3 specular = material.specular * spec * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            GouraudLight += diffuse + specular;
        }
    }

    // Final position for rasterization
    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity; // If 0, treat as disabled
};

uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Material struct
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};

{

    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

#version 330 core

layout(location = 0) in vec3 aPos;
layout(location = 1) in vec3 aNormal;

// Matrices
uniform mat4 model;
uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 projection;

// Shading mode: 0=Flat, 1=Gouraud
uniform int shadingMode;

// Outputs to the fragment shader
out vec3 FragPos;
out vec3 Normal;
out vec3 GouraudLight;
out vec2 UV;

// Lights
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// Material for Gouraud specular
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};

uniform Material material;
uniform vec3 viewPos; // Camera position in world space

void main()
{
    // Compute position in world space
    vec4 worldPos = model * vec4(aPos, 1.0);
    FragPos = worldPos.xyz;

    // Normal transformation via normal matrix
    Normal = mat3(transpose(inverse(model))) * aNormal;

    // Simple placeholder UV mapping
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5;

    // Default to black unless we're in Gouraud shading mode
    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    // Only compute Gouraud if shadingMode == 1
    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(viewPos - FragPos);

        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);

            // Diffuse
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            vec3 diffuse = material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            // Specular (Phong reflection model but computed at vertex)
            vec3 reflectDir = reflect(-lightDir, normal);
            float spec = pow(max(dot(viewDir, reflectDir), 0.0), material.shininess);
            vec3 specular = material.specular * spec * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            GouraudLight += diffuse + specular;
        }
    }

    // Final position for rasterization
    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/standard.frag
----- Shader Code Start -----
﻿#version 330 core

out vec4 FragColor;

in vec3 FragPos;
in vec3 Normal;
in vec3 GouraudLight;  // We only use this if shadingMode == 1
in vec2 UV;

// For texturing & shading controls
uniform sampler2D cowTexture;
uniform bool useTexture;
uniform int shadingMode;
uniform vec3 objectColor; // fallback if no texture

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Global ambient
uniform vec4 globalAmbient; // .a is often unused, so we just use .rgb

// Light struct
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity; // If 0, treat as disabled
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Material struct
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};
uniform Material material;

// Camera position (for specular reflection in Gouraud)
uniform vec3 viewPos;

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Main
void main()
{
    // Base color from either texture or fallback color
    vec3 baseColor = useTexture ? texture(cowTexture, UV).rgb : objectColor;

    // Start with an ambient term (global + material's own ambient color)
    vec3 totalLight = globalAmbient.rgb * material.ambient;

    if (shadingMode == 0) {
        // ----- FLAT Shading -----
        // Recompute a face normal using derivatives
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));

        // Simple diffuse for each light
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 L = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, L), 0.0);
            totalLight += material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        // ----- GOURAUD Shading -----
        // The vertex shader already computed diffuse + specular
        totalLight += GouraudLight;
    }

    // Multiply lighting by base color (texture or objectColor)
    vec3 finalColor = baseColor * totalLight;
    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

            vec3 reflectDir = reflect(-lightDir, normal);
            float spec = pow(max(dot(viewDir, reflectDir), 0.0), material.shininess);
            vec3 specular = material.specular * spec * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            GouraudLight += diffuse + specular;
        }
    }

    // Final position for rasterization
    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

----- Shader Code End -----

﻿#version 330 core

out vec4 FragColor;

in vec3 FragPos;
in vec3 Normal;
in vec3 GouraudLight;  // We only use this if shadingMode == 1
in vec2 UV;

// For texturing & shading controls
uniform sampler2D cowTexture;
uniform bool useTexture;
uniform int shadingMode;
uniform vec3 objectColor; // fallback if no texture

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Global ambient
uniform vec4 globalAmbient; // .a is often unused, so we just use .rgb

// Light struct
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity; // If 0, treat as disabled
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Material struct
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};
uniform Material material;

// Camera position (for specular reflection in Gouraud)
uniform vec3 viewPos;

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Main
void main()
{
    // Base color from either texture or fallback color
    vec3 baseColor = useTexture ? texture(cowTexture, UV).rgb : objectColor;

    // Start with an ambient term (global + material's own ambient color)
    vec3 totalLight = globalAmbient.rgb * material.ambient;

    if (shadingMode == 0) {
        // ----- FLAT Shading -----
        // Recompute a face normal using derivatives
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));

        // Simple diffuse for each light
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {

            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, L), 0.0);
            totalLight += material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        // ----- GOURAUD Shading -----
        // The vertex shader already computed diffuse + specular
        totalLight += GouraudLight;
    }

    // Multiply lighting by base color (texture or objectColor)
    vec3 finalColor = baseColor * totalLight;
    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

#version 330 core

layout(location = 0) in vec3 aPos;
layout(location = 1) in vec3 aNormal;

// Matrices
uniform mat4 model;
uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 projection;

// Shading mode: 0=Flat, 1=Gouraud
uniform int shadingMode;

// Outputs to the fragment shader
out vec3 FragPos;
out vec3 Normal;
out vec3 GouraudLight;
out vec2 UV;

// Lights
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// Material for Gouraud specular
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};

uniform Material material;
uniform vec3 viewPos; // Camera position in world space

void main()
{
    // Compute position in world space
    vec4 worldPos = model * vec4(aPos, 1.0);
    FragPos = worldPos.xyz;

    // Normal transformation via normal matrix
    Normal = mat3(transpose(inverse(model))) * aNormal;

    // Simple placeholder UV mapping
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5;

    // Default to black unless we're in Gouraud shading mode
    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    // Only compute Gouraud if shadingMode == 1
    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(viewPos - FragPos);

        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);

            // Diffuse
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            vec3 diffuse = material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            // Specular (Phong reflection model but computed at vertex)
            vec3 reflectDir = reflect(-lightDir, normal);
            float spec = pow(max(dot(viewDir, reflectDir), 0.0), material.shininess);
            vec3 specular = material.specular * spec * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            GouraudLight += diffuse + specular;
        }
    }

    // Final position for rasterization
    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

----- Shader Code Start -----
#version 330 core

layout(location = 0) in vec3 aPos;
layout(location = 1) in vec3 aNormal;

// Matrices
uniform mat4 model;
uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 projection;

// Shading mode: 0=Flat, 1=Gouraud
uniform int shadingMode;

// Outputs to the fragment shader
out vec3 FragPos;
out vec3 Normal;
out vec3 GouraudLight;
out vec2 UV;

// Lights
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// Material for Gouraud specular
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};

uniform Material material;
uniform vec3 viewPos; // Camera position in world space

void main()
{
    // Compute position in world space
    vec4 worldPos = model * vec4(aPos, 1.0);
    FragPos = worldPos.xyz;

    // Normal transformation via normal matrix
    Normal = mat3(transpose(inverse(model))) * aNormal;

    // Simple placeholder UV mapping
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5;

    // Default to black unless we're in Gouraud shading mode
    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    // Only compute Gouraud if shadingMode == 1
    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(viewPos - FragPos);

        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);

            // Diffuse
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            vec3 diffuse = material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            // Specular (Phong reflection model but computed at vertex)
            vec3 reflectDir = reflect(-lightDir, normal);
            float spec = pow(max(dot(viewDir, reflectDir), 0.0), material.shininess);
            vec3 specular = material.specular * spec * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            GouraudLight += diffuse + specular;
        }
    }

    // Final position for rasterization
    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/standard.frag
----- Shader Code Start -----
﻿#version 330 core

out vec4 FragColor;

in vec3 FragPos;
in vec3 Normal;
in vec3 GouraudLight;  // We only use this if shadingMode == 1
in vec2 UV;

// For texturing & shading controls
uniform sampler2D cowTexture;
uniform bool useTexture;
uniform int shadingMode;
uniform vec3 objectColor; // fallback if no texture

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Global ambient
uniform vec4 globalAmbient; // .a is often unused, so we just use .rgb

// Light struct
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity; // If 0, treat as disabled
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Material struct
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};
uniform Material material;

// Camera position (for specular reflection in Gouraud)
uniform vec3 viewPos;

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Main
void main()
{
    // Base color from either texture or fallback color
    vec3 baseColor = useTexture ? texture(cowTexture, UV).rgb : objectColor;

    // Start with an ambient term (global + material's own ambient color)
    vec3 totalLight = globalAmbient.rgb * material.ambient;

    if (shadingMode == 0) {
        // ----- FLAT Shading -----
        // Recompute a face normal using derivatives
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));

        // Simple diffuse for each light
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 L = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, L), 0.0);
            totalLight += material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        // ----- GOURAUD Shading -----
        // The vertex shader already computed diffuse + specular
        totalLight += GouraudLight;
    }

    // Multiply lighting by base color (texture or objectColor)
    vec3 finalColor = baseColor * totalLight;
    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

uniform vec3 objectColor; // fallback if no texture

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Global ambient
uniform vec4 globalAmbient; // .a is often unused, so we just use .rgb

// Light struct
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity; // If 0, treat as disabled
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Material struct
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};
uniform Material material;

// Camera position (for specular reflection in Gouraud)
uniform vec3 viewPos;

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Main
void main()
{
    // Base color from either texture or fallback color
    vec3 baseColor = useTexture ? texture(cowTexture, UV).rgb : objectColor;

    // Start with an ambient term (global + material's own ambient color)
    vec3 totalLight = globalAmbient.rgb * material.ambient;

    if (shadingMode == 0) {
        // ----- FLAT Shading -----
        // Recompute a face normal using derivatives
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));

        // Simple diffuse for each light
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 L = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, L), 0.0);
            totalLight += material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        // ----- GOURAUD Shading -----
        // The vertex shader already computed diffuse + specular
        totalLight += GouraudLight;
    }

    // Multiply lighting by base color (texture or objectColor)
    vec3 finalColor = baseColor * totalLight;
    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/standard.vert
----- Shader Code Start -----
#version 330 core

layout(location = 0) in vec3 aPos;
layout(location = 1) in vec3 aNormal;

// Matrices
uniform mat4 model;
uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 projection;

// Shading mode: 0=Flat, 1=Gouraud
uniform int shadingMode;

// Outputs to the fragment shader
out vec3 FragPos;
out vec3 Normal;
out vec3 GouraudLight;
out vec2 UV;

// Lights
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// Material for Gouraud specular
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};

uniform Material material;
uniform vec3 viewPos; // Camera position in world space

void main()
{
    // Compute position in world space
    vec4 worldPos = model * vec4(aPos, 1.0);
    FragPos = worldPos.xyz;

    // Normal transformation via normal matrix
    Normal = mat3(transpose(inverse(model))) * aNormal;

    // Simple placeholder UV mapping
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5;

    // Default to black unless we're in Gouraud shading mode
    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    // Only compute Gouraud if shadingMode == 1
    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(viewPos - FragPos);

        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);

            // Diffuse
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            vec3 diffuse = material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            // Specular (Phong reflection model but computed at vertex)
            vec3 reflectDir = reflect(-lightDir, normal);
            float spec = pow(max(dot(viewDir, reflectDir), 0.0), material.shininess);
            vec3 specular = material.specular * spec * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            GouraudLight += diffuse + specular;
        }
    }

    // Final position for rasterization
    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

----- Shader Code End -----

uniform mat4 model;
uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 projection;

// Shading mode: 0=Flat, 1=Gouraud
uniform int shadingMode;

// Outputs to the fragment shader
out vec3 FragPos;
out vec3 Normal;
out vec3 GouraudLight;
out vec2 UV;

// Lights
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// Material for Gouraud specular
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};

uniform Material material;
uniform vec3 viewPos; // Camera position in world space

void main()
{
    // Compute position in world space
    vec4 worldPos = model * vec4(aPos, 1.0);
    FragPos = worldPos.xyz;

    // Normal transformation via normal matrix
    Normal = mat3(transpose(inverse(model))) * aNormal;

    // Simple placeholder UV mapping
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5;

    // Default to black unless we're in Gouraud shading mode
    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    // Only compute Gouraud if shadingMode == 1
    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(viewPos - FragPos);

        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);

            // Diffuse
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            vec3 diffuse = material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            // Specular (Phong reflection model but computed at vertex)
            vec3 reflectDir = reflect(-lightDir, normal);
            float spec = pow(max(dot(viewDir, reflectDir), 0.0), material.shininess);
            vec3 specular = material.specular * spec * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            GouraudLight += diffuse + specular;
        }
    }

    // Final position for rasterization
    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/standard.frag
----- Shader Code Start -----
﻿#version 330 core

out vec4 FragColor;

in vec3 FragPos;
in vec3 Normal;
in vec3 GouraudLight;  // We only use this if shadingMode == 1
in vec2 UV;

// For texturing & shading controls
uniform sampler2D cowTexture;
uniform bool useTexture;
uniform int shadingMode;
uniform vec3 objectColor; // fallback if no texture

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Global ambient
uniform vec4 globalAmbient; // .a is often unused, so we just use .rgb

// Light struct
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity; // If 0, treat as disabled
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Material struct
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};
uniform Material material;

// Camera position (for specular reflection in Gouraud)
uniform vec3 viewPos;

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Main
void main()
{
    // Base color from either texture or fallback color
    vec3 baseColor = useTexture ? texture(cowTexture, UV).rgb : objectColor;

    // Start with an ambient term (global + material's own ambient color)
    vec3 totalLight = globalAmbient.rgb * material.ambient;

    if (shadingMode == 0) {
        // ----- FLAT Shading -----
        // Recompute a face normal using derivatives
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));

        // Simple diffuse for each light
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 L = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, L), 0.0);
            totalLight += material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        // ----- GOURAUD Shading -----
        // The vertex shader already computed diffuse + specular
        totalLight += GouraudLight;
    }

    // Multiply lighting by base color (texture or objectColor)
    vec3 finalColor = baseColor * totalLight;
    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

// Material struct
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};
uniform Material material;

// Camera position (for specular reflection in Gouraud)
uniform vec3 viewPos;

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Main
void main()
{
    // Base color from either texture or fallback color
    vec3 baseColor = useTexture ? texture(cowTexture, UV).rgb : objectColor;

    // Start with an ambient term (global + material's own ambient color)
    vec3 totalLight = globalAmbient.rgb * material.ambient;

    if (shadingMode == 0) {
        // ----- FLAT Shading -----
        // Recompute a face normal using derivatives
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));

        // Simple diffuse for each light
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 L = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, L), 0.0);
            totalLight += material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        // ----- GOURAUD Shading -----
        // The vertex shader already computed diffuse + specular
        totalLight += GouraudLight;
    }

    // Multiply lighting by base color (texture or objectColor)
    vec3 finalColor = baseColor * totalLight;
    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/standard.vert
----- Shader Code Start -----
#version 330 core

layout(location = 0) in vec3 aPos;
layout(location = 1) in vec3 aNormal;

// Matrices
uniform mat4 model;
uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 projection;

// Shading mode: 0=Flat, 1=Gouraud
uniform int shadingMode;

// Outputs to the fragment shader
out vec3 FragPos;
out vec3 Normal;
out vec3 GouraudLight;
out vec2 UV;

// Lights
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// Material for Gouraud specular
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};

uniform Material material;
uniform vec3 viewPos; // Camera position in world space

void main()
{
    // Compute position in world space
    vec4 worldPos = model * vec4(aPos, 1.0);
    FragPos = worldPos.xyz;

    // Normal transformation via normal matrix
    Normal = mat3(transpose(inverse(model))) * aNormal;

    // Simple placeholder UV mapping
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5;

    // Default to black unless we're in Gouraud shading mode
    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    // Only compute Gouraud if shadingMode == 1
    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(viewPos - FragPos);

        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);

            // Diffuse
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            vec3 diffuse = material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            // Specular (Phong reflection model but computed at vertex)
            vec3 reflectDir = reflect(-lightDir, normal);
            float spec = pow(max(dot(viewDir, reflectDir), 0.0), material.shininess);
            vec3 specular = material.specular * spec * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            GouraudLight += diffuse + specular;
        }
    }

    // Final position for rasterization
    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/standard.vert
----- Shader Code Start -----
#version 330 core

layout(location = 0) in vec3 aPos;
layout(location = 1) in vec3 aNormal;

// Matrices
uniform mat4 model;
uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 projection;

// Shading mode: 0=Flat, 1=Gouraud
uniform int shadingMode;

// Outputs to the fragment shader
out vec3 FragPos;
out vec3 Normal;
out vec3 GouraudLight;
out vec2 UV;

// Lights
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// Material for Gouraud specular
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};

uniform Material material;
uniform vec3 viewPos; // Camera position in world space

void main()
{
    // Compute position in world space
    vec4 worldPos = model * vec4(aPos, 1.0);
    FragPos = worldPos.xyz;

    // Normal transformation via normal matrix
    Normal = mat3(transpose(inverse(model))) * aNormal;

    // Simple placeholder UV mapping
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5;

    // Default to black unless we're in Gouraud shading mode
    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    // Only compute Gouraud if shadingMode == 1
    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(viewPos - FragPos);

        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);

            // Diffuse
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            vec3 diffuse = material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            // Specular (Phong reflection model but computed at vertex)
            vec3 reflectDir = reflect(-lightDir, normal);
            float spec = pow(max(dot(viewDir, reflectDir), 0.0), material.shininess);
            vec3 specular = material.specular * spec * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            GouraudLight += diffuse + specular;
        }
    }

    // Final position for rasterization
    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/standard.frag
----- Shader Code Start -----
﻿#version 330 core

out vec4 FragColor;

in vec3 FragPos;
in vec3 Normal;
in vec3 GouraudLight;  // We only use this if shadingMode == 1
in vec2 UV;

// For texturing & shading controls
uniform sampler2D cowTexture;
uniform bool useTexture;
uniform int shadingMode;
uniform vec3 objectColor; // fallback if no texture

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Global ambient
uniform vec4 globalAmbient; // .a is often unused, so we just use .rgb

// Light struct
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity; // If 0, treat as disabled
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Material struct
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};
uniform Material material;

// Camera position (for specular reflection in Gouraud)
uniform vec3 viewPos;

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Main
void main()
{
    // Base color from either texture or fallback color
    vec3 baseColor = useTexture ? texture(cowTexture, UV).rgb : objectColor;

    // Start with an ambient term (global + material's own ambient color)
    vec3 totalLight = globalAmbient.rgb * material.ambient;

    if (shadingMode == 0) {
        // ----- FLAT Shading -----
        // Recompute a face normal using derivatives
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));

        // Simple diffuse for each light
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 L = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, L), 0.0);
            totalLight += material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        // ----- GOURAUD Shading -----
        // The vertex shader already computed diffuse + specular
        totalLight += GouraudLight;
    }

    // Multiply lighting by base color (texture or objectColor)
    vec3 finalColor = baseColor * totalLight;
    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity; // If 0, treat as disabled
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Material struct
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};
uniform Material material;

// Camera position (for specular reflection in Gouraud)
uniform vec3 viewPos;

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Main
void main()
{
    // Base color from either texture or fallback color
    vec3 baseColor = useTexture ? texture(cowTexture, UV).rgb : objectColor;

    // Start with an ambient term (global + material's own ambient color)
    vec3 totalLight = globalAmbient.rgb * material.ambient;

    if (shadingMode == 0) {
        // ----- FLAT Shading -----
        // Recompute a face normal using derivatives
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));

        // Simple diffuse for each light
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 L = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, L), 0.0);
            totalLight += material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        // ----- GOURAUD Shading -----
        // The vertex shader already computed diffuse + specular
        totalLight += GouraudLight;
    }

    // Multiply lighting by base color (texture or objectColor)
    vec3 finalColor = baseColor * totalLight;
    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/standard.vert
----- Shader Code Start -----
#version 330 core

layout(location = 0) in vec3 aPos;
layout(location = 1) in vec3 aNormal;

// Matrices
uniform mat4 model;
uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 projection;

// Shading mode: 0=Flat, 1=Gouraud
uniform int shadingMode;

// Outputs to the fragment shader
out vec3 FragPos;
out vec3 Normal;
out vec3 GouraudLight;
out vec2 UV;

// Lights
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// Material for Gouraud specular
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};

uniform Material material;
uniform vec3 viewPos; // Camera position in world space

void main()
{
    // Compute position in world space
    vec4 worldPos = model * vec4(aPos, 1.0);
    FragPos = worldPos.xyz;

    // Normal transformation via normal matrix
    Normal = mat3(transpose(inverse(model))) * aNormal;

    // Simple placeholder UV mapping
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5;

    // Default to black unless we're in Gouraud shading mode
    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    // Only compute Gouraud if shadingMode == 1
    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(viewPos - FragPos);

        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);

            // Diffuse
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            vec3 diffuse = material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            // Specular (Phong reflection model but computed at vertex)
            vec3 reflectDir = reflect(-lightDir, normal);
            float spec = pow(max(dot(viewDir, reflectDir), 0.0), material.shininess);
            vec3 specular = material.specular * spec * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            GouraudLight += diffuse + specular;
        }
    }

    // Final position for rasterization
    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

----- Shader Code End -----

// Shading mode: 0=Flat, 1=Gouraud

// Outputs to the fragment shader
out vec3 FragPos;
out vec3 Normal;
out vec3 GouraudLight;
out vec2 UV;

// Lights
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// Material for Gouraud specular
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};

uniform Material material;
uniform vec3 viewPos; // Camera position in world space

void main()
{
    // Compute position in world space
    vec4 worldPos = model * vec4(aPos, 1.0);
    FragPos = worldPos.xyz;

    // Normal transformation via normal matrix
    Normal = mat3(transpose(inverse(model))) * aNormal;

    // Simple placeholder UV mapping
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5;

    // Default to black unless we're in Gouraud shading mode
    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    // Only compute Gouraud if shadingMode == 1
    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(viewPos - FragPos);

        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);

            // Diffuse
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            vec3 diffuse = material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            // Specular (Phong reflection model but computed at vertex)
            vec3 reflectDir = reflect(-lightDir, normal);
            float spec = pow(max(dot(viewDir, reflectDir), 0.0), material.shininess);
            vec3 specular = material.specular * spec * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            GouraudLight += diffuse + specular;
        }
    }

    // Final position for rasterization
    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}

----- Shader Code End -----

? Opened shader file: shaders/standard.frag
----- Shader Code Start -----
﻿#version 330 core

out vec4 FragColor;

in vec3 FragPos;
in vec3 Normal;
in vec3 GouraudLight;  // We only use this if shadingMode == 1
in vec2 UV;

// For texturing & shading controls
uniform sampler2D cowTexture;
uniform bool useTexture;
uniform int shadingMode;
uniform vec3 objectColor; // fallback if no texture

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Global ambient
uniform vec4 globalAmbient; // .a is often unused, so we just use .rgb

// Light struct
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity; // If 0, treat as disabled
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Material struct
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};
uniform Material material;

// Camera position (for specular reflection in Gouraud)
uniform vec3 viewPos;

// ------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Main
void main()
{
    // Base color from either texture or fallback color
    vec3 baseColor = useTexture ? texture(cowTexture, UV).rgb : objectColor;

    // Start with an ambient term (global + material's own ambient color)
    vec3 totalLight = globalAmbient.rgb * material.ambient;

    if (shadingMode == 0) {
        // ----- FLAT Shading -----
        // Recompute a face normal using derivatives
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));

        // Simple diffuse for each light
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 L = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, L), 0.0);
            totalLight += material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        // ----- GOURAUD Shading -----
        // The vertex shader already computed diffuse + specular
        totalLight += GouraudLight;
    }

    // Multiply lighting by base color (texture or objectColor)
    vec3 finalColor = baseColor * totalLight;
    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

    if (shadingMode == 0) {
        // ----- FLAT Shading -----
        // Recompute a face normal using derivatives
        vec3 faceNormal = normalize(cross(dFdx(FragPos), dFdy(FragPos)));

        // Simple diffuse for each light
        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 L = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);
            float diff = max(dot(faceNormal, L), 0.0);
            totalLight += material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;
        }
    }
    else if (shadingMode == 1) {
        // ----- GOURAUD Shading -----
        // The vertex shader already computed diffuse + specular
        totalLight += GouraudLight;
    }

    // Multiply lighting by base color (texture or objectColor)
    vec3 finalColor = baseColor * totalLight;
    FragColor = vec4(finalColor, 1.0);
}

----- Shader Code End -----

#version 330 core

layout(location = 0) in vec3 aPos;
layout(location = 1) in vec3 aNormal;

// Matrices
uniform mat4 model;
uniform mat4 view;
uniform mat4 projection;

// Shading mode: 0=Flat, 1=Gouraud
uniform int shadingMode;

// Outputs to the fragment shader
out vec3 FragPos;
out vec3 Normal;
out vec3 GouraudLight;
out vec2 UV;

// Lights
struct Light {
    vec3 position;
    vec3 color;
    float intensity;
};

#define MAX_LIGHTS 10
uniform int numLights;
uniform Light lights[MAX_LIGHTS];

// Material for Gouraud specular
struct Material {
    vec3 diffuse;
    vec3 specular;
    vec3 ambient;
    float shininess;
    float roughness;
    float metallic;
};

uniform Material material;
uniform vec3 viewPos; // Camera position in world space

void main()
{
    // Compute position in world space
    vec4 worldPos = model * vec4(aPos, 1.0);
    FragPos = worldPos.xyz;

    // Normal transformation via normal matrix
    Normal = mat3(transpose(inverse(model))) * aNormal;

    // Simple placeholder UV mapping
    UV = aPos.xy * 0.5 + 0.5;

    // Default to black unless we're in Gouraud shading mode
    GouraudLight = vec3(0.0);

    // Only compute Gouraud if shadingMode == 1
    if (shadingMode == 1) {
        vec3 normal = normalize(Normal);
        vec3 viewDir = normalize(viewPos - FragPos);

        for (int i = 0; i < numLights; i++) {
            vec3 lightDir = normalize(lights[i].position - FragPos);

            // Diffuse
            float diff = max(dot(normal, lightDir), 0.0);
            vec3 diffuse = material.diffuse * diff * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            // Specular (Phong reflection model but computed at vertex)
            vec3 reflectDir = reflect(-lightDir, normal);
            float spec = pow(max(dot(viewDir, reflectDir), 0.0), material.shininess);
            vec3 specular = material.specular * spec * lights[i].color * lights[i].intensity;

            GouraudLight += diffuse + specular;
        }
    }

    // Final position for rasterization
    gl_Position = projection * view * worldPos;
}
